title: BMW India posts record sales at 7,098 units in Jan-Jun
description: BMW Group India excelled in the first half of the year, achieving record sales and maintaining leadership in the luxury electric car segment. President Vikram Pawah expressed satisfaction with the company's performance, highlighting a focus on business performance and customer satisfaction to drive success.
